title: Resume Builder
desc: The Resume Builder project, sponsored by the PFW Career Development Center, helps students create strong, job-ready resumes. It uses AI to match student qualifications with targeted job descriptions.

title: ProFolio
desc: PROFOLIO is a no-code web application that lets users easily create personalized, visually appealing portfolios. It's designed for developers, designers, artists, and students to showcase their work and skills.

title: Operating Systems
desc: A multi-phase Operating Systems project in C and Unix shell scripting, featuring CPU/memory simulation, multi-process execution with scheduling, socket-based communication, and a memory manager for efficient process allocation.

title: UTD FreshMart
desc: An e-commerce platform for UTD FreshMart, enabling customers to shop for food and household items online. It includes features for vendor inventory management and admin oversight of transactions and operations.

title: My Portfolio
desc: A personal portfolio website hosted on GitHub to showcase projects, skills, and experience in a clean, responsive design.
